message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is just too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to go above $12,000 for the product. Would $12,500 be acceptable?
